斈字的基本解释

斈
xué
同“学”。

斈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xué］
［《廣韻》胡覺切，入覺，匣。］
亦作“斈1”。“学1”的繁体字。
(1)学习。
(2)学习的人。
(3)效法，模仿。
(4)描画；书写。
(5)如，象。
(6)学校。
(7)学科。
(8)学问。
(9)学说。
(10)学派。
(11)注释阐述。
(12)述说，诉说。
(13)通“鷽”。参见“學鳩”。
(14)通“礐”。参见“學學”。
[②]［xiào］
［《集韻》後教切，去效，匣。］
同“斆1”。亦作“斈2”。“学2”的繁体字。
教导。

斈字的康熙字典解释
斈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
斈字的起名意思

同“学”。

learn
Basic explanation of words
learn
xué
Same as "learning".
learn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xué］
["Guangyun" Hu Jueqie, Entering Jue, Xie. ]
Also known as "Learning 1". Traditional characters of "学1".
(1) Study.
(2) People who study.
(3) Follow and imitate.
(4) Drawing; writing.
(5) Such as, elephant.
(6) School.
(7) Subjects.
(8) Knowledge.
(9) Doctrine.
(10) School.
(11) Explanation of comments.
(12) Tell, tell.
(13) Through "snake". See "study dove".
(14) Through "礐". See "learning".
[②]［xiào］
[After "Jiyun" teaches cutting, to effect, box. ]
Same as "斆1". Also known as "Learning 2". "学2" in traditional characters.
teach.
learn
